entry.title: New release for WordPress ActivityPub: 6.0.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add in_reply_to Actor to Activity audience by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1711
  • Validate $type integrity for published posts by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1713
  • Add fallback-avatar to reaction dropdown list by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1719
  • Update WP requirement to 6.5 by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1703
  • Remove deprecated functions, filters and actions by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1723
  • Follow Me: Make it interactive! by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1691
  • Improve Surge wp-config handling by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1724
  • Remove the JS wave effect by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1718
  • Reactions: Use Interactivity API by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1722
  • Re-add HTML handling for summaries/excerpts by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1731
  • Fix: Site-Health WebFinger check by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1733
  • Strip shortcodes from the excerpt by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1730
  • Remote Reply: Use Interactivity API by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1721
  • Editor: Fix console warnings by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1748
  • Improve how the plugin stores Followers by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1726
  • Interactions: Don't show likes and reposts for comments by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1735
  • User Option: Limit to users with Activitypub cap by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1754
  • Change: Use post_content to store Actor-JSON by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1751
  • Followers: Use Interactivity API by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1747
  • Editor Script: Add back compat with WP 6.5 by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1760
  • Fix #1764 by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1765
  • Blocks: Don't return null for string value by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1766
  • Add h-card to support the IndieWeb movement by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1771

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/compare/5.9.2...6.0.0
